name: ecstatic
description: CLI tool for website optimization - download, optimize, and deploy static sites

scripts.compile: rm -rf ./dist-exec/* && NODE_ENV=production npx bun build --compile --define process.env.ECSTATIC_ENV='"production"' --minify --bytecode --target=bun-linux-x64 ./bin/ecstatic.js --outfile ./dist-exec/ecstatic
scripts.compile:macos: rm -rf ./dist-exec/* && NODE_ENV=production npx bun build --compile --define process.env.ECSTATIC_ENV='"production"' --minify --bytecode --target=bun-darwin-arm64 ./bin/ecstatic.js --outfile ./dist-exec/ecstatic
scripts.jampack: npm run jampack:install && npm run jampack:compress
scripts.jampack:compress: rm -rf packages/jampack/* && tar -cJf packages/jampack/jampack-dist.tar.xz -C tmp/jampack dist/ node_modules/ package.json
scripts.jampack:install: rm -rf tmp/jampack/* && cp -r ../jampack/dist tmp/jampack && cp -r ../jampack/node_modules tmp/jampack && cp ../jampack/package.json tmp/jampack/
scripts.siteone: npm run siteone:install && npm run siteone:compress
scripts.siteone:compress: rm -rf packages/siteone/* && tar -cJf packages/siteone/siteone-dist.tar.xz -C tmp/siteone src/ vendor/ bin/
scripts.siteone:install: rm -rf tmp/siteone/* && cp -r ../siteone-crawler/src tmp/siteone && cp -r ../siteone-crawler/vendor tmp/siteone && cp -r ../siteone-crawler/bin tmp/siteone
